name: ChartDataLabel
description: Represents the data label of a chart point.

properties.name: position
properties.description: DataLabelPosition value that represents the position of the data label.

properties.name: showValue
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label value is visible or not.

properties.name: showSeriesName
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label series name is visible or not.

properties.name: showCategoryName
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label category name is visible or not.

properties.name: showLegendKey
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label legend key is visible or not.

properties.name: showPercentage
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label percentage is visible or not.

properties.name: showBubbleSize
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the data label bubble size is visible or not.

properties.name: separator
properties.description: String representing the separator used for the data label on a chart.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of chart data label to the top of chart area. Null if chart data label is not visible.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of chart data label to the left edge of chart area. Null if chart data label is not visible.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Returns the width, in points, of the chart data label. Read-only. Null if chart data label is not visible.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Returns the height, in points, of the chart data label. Read-only. Null if chart data label is not visible.

properties.name: formula
properties.description: String value that represents the formula of chart data label using A1-style notation.

properties.name: textOrientation
properties.description: Represents the text orientation of chart data label. The value should be an integer either from -90 to 90, or 180 for vertically-oriented text.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment of chart data label.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for chart data label.

properties.name: text
properties.description: String representing the text of the data label on a chart.

properties.name: autoText
properties.description: Boolean value representing if data label automatically generates appropriate text based on context.

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: String value that represents the format code for data label.

properties.name: linkNumberFormat
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the number format is linked to the cells (so that the number format changes in the labels when it changes in the cells).

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the format of chart data label.
